course_description:
This open-access conversation exchange site offers topics and conversation tasks for students learning Russian and English. The goal of this pilot project is to support exchanges between students in English-speaking and Russian-speaking countries. 

The conversation topics included are aligned with common college-level Russian language curricula, grouped by levels defined by {{% resource_link "3bccd0ad-7366-4434-b087-f22e59bcc518" "ACTFL proficiency standards," %}} and utilize {{% resource_link "03cfca05-2b2f-4f7a-af59-16677f559ff5" "OPI (Oral Proficiency Interview)" %}} practices. Topics include vocabulary, questions, and interactive activities that can be used in conversations as well as in individual practice.

{{% resource_link "fdd36558-e787-450f-ad58-cad38f9337d5" "Maria Khotimsky" %}} (MIT) initiated this project based on {{% resource_link "d1994635-dcc1-437b-825b-7f0356f82d56" "conversation exchanges" %}} between SkolTech and MIT students, in collaboration with Dr. Marina Alexandrova (UT Austin) and Iringa Kogel (Davidson College).

The Телемосты website is published under a {{% resource_link "4c36f0fa-4255-43ac-9075-1179aa1292e2" "Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 (CC BY-NC-SA) International" %}} license.
